subject: Tests (Drug Use)
Doping (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ryan Braun, the Brewers’ left fielder, who leads the National League in home runs, won his appeal of a positive drug test but can’t escape the shadow of suspicion.
snippet: Ryan Braun, the Brewers’ left fielder, who leads the National League in home runs, won his appeal of a positive drug test but can’t escape the shadow of suspicion.
